section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically render the contents of the sub element placed lower in relationship to the surrounding text. Subscripted text also is often a smaller font than the surrounding text.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The sub element is specialized from ph.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: The power produced by the electrohydraulic dam was 1010 more than the older electric plant. The difference was H2O.
